analysis.description:
Crowdsale.GetEXHFundAccount (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#614-644) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- remainder == 0
	- remainder == 1
	- remainder == 2
	- remainder == 3
	- remainder == 4
	- remainder == 5
	- remainder == 6
	- remainder == 7
	- remainder == 8

Crowdsale.GetEXHFundAccount (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#614-644) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- remainder == 0
	- remainder == 1
	- remainder == 2
	- remainder == 3
	- remainder == 4
	- remainder == 5
	- remainder == 6
	- remainder == 7
	- remainder == 8
Crowdsale.start (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#434-451) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(startBlock == 0)

Crowdsale.refund has external calls inside a loop:
	- investorAddress.transfer(investorStruct.weiReceivedCrowdsaleType1) (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#670-671)

Crowdsale.valueOneEther should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#332-333)
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#59)
EXH.version should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#182-184)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.13 (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of EXH.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#266) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of EXH.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#225) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EXH.transfer (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#225-226) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of EXH.allowance (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#288) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of EXH.allowance (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#288-290) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_from' of EXH.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#243) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_to' of EXH.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#243) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EXH.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#243) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_spender' of EXH.approve (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#273) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of EXH.approve (/unique_contracts/0xff030dca3c6d546328945b6c1bcdb4f5ba2b22da.sol#273) is not in mixedCase
